channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Data Center GPU Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Data Center GPU Manager

item.title: CVE-2022-21820|2024-08-03T02:53:36.259Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20data%20center%20gpu%20manager
item.description: NVIDIA DCGM contains a vulnerability in nvhostengine, where a network user can cause detection of error conditions without action, which may lead to limited code execution, some denial of service, escalation of privileges, and limited impacts to both data confidentiality and integrity.
